name: As Long As We Are Together
name_original: As Long As We Are Together
description:
Save your love, trapped in a crystal at the top of a tower. But be careful, exploring ruins can be dangerous...

Game made during the RIJV Game Jam "Cassons les clichés" (Let's break clichés)

Credits:

Gabrielle Barboteau
Jonathan Coryn
Laura Noël
Mélanie Courtinat
